text: right Egízio Antônio Calloni (born 6 December 1961, in São Paulo) is a Brazilian actor, best known for Os Dias Eram Assim (2017), Dois Irmãos (2017), and Brazilian Western (2013). ==References== Category:Brazilian actors Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Male actors from São Paulo
title: Antônio Calloni
